meanings.definition: Following the completion of a degree or course of study.
meanings.sent1: The postgraduation ceremony was a joyous occasion for all the students.
meanings.sent2: She received a postgraduation scholarship for her outstanding academic performance.
meanings.sent3: After the postgraduation party, everyone felt proud of their achievements.
meanings.sent4: The postgraduation phase marked a new beginning in her career.
meanings.sent5: The postgraduation success was a result of her hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring after graduation.
meanings.sent1: The postgraduation job opportunities were plentiful for the new graduates.
meanings.sent2: He pursued a postgraduation course to further enhance his skills.
meanings.sent3: The postgraduation trip with friends was a memorable experience.
meanings.sent4: Her postgraduation plans included traveling and gaining work experience.
meanings.sent5: The postgraduation celebrations lasted late into the night.
